ygData.subject: RE: secret nerfing
ygData.msgSnippet: To change things this basic in nature without any warning or notice is simply unacceptable. Yes, before I found NOTHING in Unrest (there might have been, but I
ygData.messageBody:
To change things this basic in nature without any warning or notice is
simply unacceptable.

Yes, before I found NOTHING in Unrest (there might have been, but I never
met it) could see thru our invis.

Oh well, I haven't even logged on for 3 weeks - this is just another nail
in my EQ account, I simply have no desire to fund a game that has so little
consideration for the people that play it.

I loved my bard - and I loved crafts. They've already destroyed the latter,
looks like they are now chipping away at the former as well.

There is simply nothing left for me to enjoy in Norrath.




At 09:48 AM 8/6/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
>I think I can pretty much confirm that Mystic Clouding used to make us
>invisible to undead as well as the living, (AND our fellow group members)
>but in the last 2 days the undead have seen me consistently while singing
>it. If anyone else want to test this out or has similar experience with
>this, let us know.
>
>It was a typical strategy for me when visiting unrest to go invis right
>outside the zone, zone in, restart the song, and start shouting for a group
>and wandering around the courtyard and walls. This way I would be left
>alone from suprise attacks. Then when a group might answer me with
>something like "meet us in the barkeep room" I would just run in and join
>them, then stop the song. Many many times I strolled right past trains from
>the basement and stood next to hags, etc, without being noticed. Not
>anymore :-( Looks like this Bard needs to learn to be a bit more careful
>from now on.
>
>Faras Tar'Linedhel
>E'ci
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>ONElist: your connection to like-minds and kindred spirits.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
